product_name: Lezyne Deca Drive Front Bike Light
long_description: Sleek, compact and durable thanks to its machined aluminum body, the Lezyne Deca Drive Front Bike Light offers commuters and evening riders 800 lumens for very good visibility in the dark. 3 high-performance LEDs emit a 800-lumen beam that runs for 1.5 hrs. on high and 16 hrs. on flashing; recharge after your ride with the included USB cable. Light can be seen from the side to enhance visibility in traffic. Specialized power-saving mode allows quick switching between high lighting and medium lighting. Power Indicator button lets you check the power level any time. The Lezyne Deca Drive Front Bike Light includes a Lezyne wall adaptor to recharge at an outlet, Micro USB charging cable and handlebar mounts.
short_description: Sleek, compact and durable thanks to its machined aluminum body, the Lezyne Deca Drive Front Bike Light offers commuters and evening riders 800 lumens for very good visibility in the dark.
